location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Price, Acting Paymaster, to James Dow, Assistant Surgeon and Acting Resident in Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the payment of British forces in the Persian Gulf. Price writes to acknowledge receipt from the Residency of 64,000 New Persian Rupees, and 2,700 German crowns. Price writes that it is desired that the remaining half a lack (50,000) be raised in the next two months, and encloses with his letter (not included in the volume) a Bill of Exchange on the Accountant General at Bombay.
